titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached to the Kings Mtie. at Whitehall, 24 Febr. 1625. By Iohn Donne Deane of Saint Pauls, London. And now by his Maiestes [sic] commandment published
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Thomas Iones, dwelling at the Blacke Rauen in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: The year in the title is according to Lady Day dating, i.e. 1626.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Also issued as part of: Five sermons upon speciall occasions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blacke Rauen in the Strand
